entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 15. POP 40%
